name: NumberLock
description:
A game that is about numbers and calculation.

NumberLock is a puzzle game that each number is a separated "Plug". You have to do some calculation provided by each level in order to complete the level by matching the target "Socket".

The base game contains 9 tutorial levels and a demo level. However, you can find more level packs in the extension page. It is up to you to play any level you want and there is no limitation.

Check the informations for extensions and alternative page.

This game requires Python 3.8 or higher and Pygame (Recommend Pygame 2) to run.
(Also yes you can run it on Windows 7 do not ask me again)
